name: Three Shots Left
description:
You play as the sheriff of this town and a group of robbers is trying to rob the bank. It's your duty to but an end to their scheme . Take down robbers with Clockwork bullets that can reverse time.

The Clockwork bullet work by having a clockwork inside, that work by work faster than light speed, bending time and reverse the time around it.

instruction:

-WASD to move

-click to shoot

-you can press E when you shoot all three bullet out and all bullet will return  to you

-If your run out of bullet your gun will change into your hand, which can deal melee damage 

Kill wave of enemies and try to earn the highest score possible.
